title: TIME ZONES
guide:
### Offset Calculation

Memorize the offset from London (UTC).

#### Key References
| City | Offset | Direction |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **New York** | UTC -5 | West (Subtract) |
| **Los Angeles**| UTC -8 | West (Subtract) |
| **London** | UTC 0 | Center |
| **Paris** | UTC +1 | East (Add) |
| **Moscow** | UTC +3 | East (Add) |
| **Tokyo** | UTC +9 | East (Add) |
| **Sydney** | UTC +11 | East (Add) |

#### Rollover Rule
* Result â‰¥ 24: Tomorrow (Subtract 24).
* Result < 0: Yesterday (Add 24).
